effect.short: Increases evasion to 1.25× during [hail]{mechanic:hail}.  Protects against hail damage.
effect.full:
During [hail]{mechanic:hail}, this Pokémon has 1.25× its [evasion]{mechanic:evasion}, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.

The evasion bonus does not count as a [stat modifier]{mechanic:stat-modifier}.

Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in snow.
